meanings.sent1: The papergirl rode her bike to deliver newspapers to the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the papergirl walks around the neighborhood dropping off newspapers.
meanings.sent3: The papergirl accidentally delivered newspapers to the wrong houses, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: She moved through the streets like a papergirl on a mission, spreading news to all corners.
meanings.sent5: The image of the papergirl with a bag full of newspapers is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A young female who distributes newspapers to subscribers.
meanings.sent1: The papergirl greeted each subscriber with a smile as she handed out newspapers.
meanings.sent2: As a papergirl, she made sure to deliver newspapers promptly to all subscribers.
meanings.sent3: The papergirl joked with the subscribers while handing out newspapers, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication as a papergirl shone through as she tirelessly distributed newspapers.
meanings.sent5: The papergirl's bag was filled with newspapers, ready to be delivered to eager subscribers.
